item.description: Its a bit warm but if we decided to do a leashed pack walk there are plenty of places to take a breather, water the pups and ourselves as well as keep cool. We frequent there often, walk the paths and when adventurous hike the trails. There is a pond and large grassy areas as well as a very welcoming dog friendly environment. We could meet on a sunday and casually walk around while socilaizing or the more daring of us could venture up the mountain. No matter what you choose its a great day out in the sun and fresh air with our best friends...showing off the bully breeds finest! Lets plan a date soon when we can all confirm availability...with summer I know its harder but maybe a nice morning meet about 9am would be ideal"!?
item.name: Blue hills in Milton, MA...
